actions_and_stuff.title: Actions and Stuff
actions_and_stuff.description: The Animation Pack You Didn't Know You Needed: Bring your world to life with new animations particles textures and more! - Player Animations (1st & 3rd Person) - New & Improved Mob Animations - 3D Item Models - Custom Armour - A Complete & Faithful Texture Overhaul - Compatible with Vanilla textures or your own texture packs - So much more!
